articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: ‘No shame in losing to five-time champions’: Gavaskar tries to lift India's mood - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Sunil Gavaskar said he was sad after India lost in the World Cup final to Australia but added that he was mighty proud of their performance in the tournament. | Cricket
articles.content: After producing a commanding show throughout the World Cup campaign, Rohit Sharma-led Team India failed to replicate the performance when it mattered the most. The team was outplayed by Pat Cummins' … [+2694 chars]

articles.author: Dishya Sharma
articles.title: Anushka Sharma Hugs Heartbroken Virat Kohli After India Loses ICC World Cup 2023 Final; See Viral Pic - News18
articles.description: Anushka Sharma was seen consoling Virat Kohli after team India lost the World Cup 2023 trophy to Australia.
articles.content: Anushka Sharma was seen consoling Virat Kohli after India lost the ICC World Cup 2023 final to Australia. In a photo shared on Twitter, now known as X, Anushka was seen hugging a heartbroken Virat af… [+1565 chars]
